title: 170) Ind-2, dated 27thJune, 2023 as amended from time to time
clause_text: 170) Ind-2, dated 27thJune, 2023 as amended from time to time. Floating of FSI shall not be permissible from the area of IT / IT use to the area of Support Activities or vice versa, but floating of FSI shall be permitted within the respective areas of IT / ITES and Support Activities separately.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
